mapper.select: select * from mid.tm_com_auth where act_yn = 'Y' order by auth_id desc
select auth_id , auth_nm , act_yn from mid.tm_com_auth where auth_id = #{auth_id} order by auth_id

select distinct u.user_id , u.user_nm , ua.auth_id , COALESCE(o.org_nm, '-') as org_id , u.email_id ||'@'|| u.email_dm as email , u.cell_ph1 ||'-'|| u.cell_ph2 ||'-'|| u.cell_ph3 as cell_ph , u.crt_id , (substring(u.crt_dt from 1 for 4)||'.' ||substring(u.crt_dt from 5 for 2)||'.' ||substring(u.crt_dt from 7 for 2)||' ' ||substring(u.crt_dt from 9 for 2)||':' ||substring(u.crt_dt from 11 for 2)||':' ||substring(u.crt_dt from 12 for 2)) as crt_dt from mid.tm_com_user u , mid.tm_com_user_auth ua , mid.tm_com_org o left outer join mid.tm_com_org o1 on o.org_id = o1.org_id where u.user_id = ua.user_id and ua.auth_id = #{auth_id} and o.org_id = u.org_id order by u.user_id desc
